page.title: 02LOCAL NEWS ITEMS.
page.content: Houses can get 5 free papers:Lea Valley Star,Extra,Yellow Advertiser, Classified and Mid-Week Mercury, consisting of local news,adverts also the West Essex Gazette and Lea Valley Mercury (15p).MAIN NEWS JUL 85:Week Carnival in Waltham Abbey ending in a parade on the Saturday;The Govt. are closing Honey Lane Hospital,Waltham Abbey.Councillors and local people agreed to fight the closure using 2000 pounds Council money to help;Bikers that gather in High Beech have been told to"buzz off".They use the road outside the King's Oak as a race track;Hoaxers have put lives at risk by fake calls to the Fire Brigade;A tank of chemicals dripped onto the M25 at Waltham Abbey;Forest roads at High Beech are being closed because of traffic.The Transport Committee said Claypit Hill should be closed.
